**2b)**
```{r}
n <- 20
y <- 36
theta <- seq(0.1, 5, length = 50)
py.theta <- dpois(y, lambda = n*theta)
ptheta <- rep(1/50, length = length(theta))
ptheta.y <- py.theta * ptheta/sum(py.theta * ptheta)
plot(theta, ptheta.y)
```
